title: Menopause: myths and realities
creator_credit: Wexler Film Productions, Paul Burnford and Zedda Burnford
brief_description: This program shows six women going through the various stages and experiencing the myriad of menopausal symptoms. The program is positive - solutions are offered and avenues for help are explored.
creator_credit_for_label: Wexler Film Productions, Paul Burnford and Zedda Burnford
